com.illcode.meterman.impl

Class BaseRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illcode.meterman.impl.BaseRoom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Room
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DarkRoom

    public class BaseRoom
extends Object
implements Room
    A Room implementation that supports various standard features, and can be used as a starting point for more game-specific implementations.

      • getExitName

        public String getExitName()
        Description copied from interface: Room
        Returns a potentially shorter version of the name, to be used in Exit buttons. This method may return a different name depending on whether the room has been visited.
        Specified by:
        getExitName in interface Room

      • getExit

        public Room getExit(int direction)
        Description copied from interface: Room
        Return the room associated with a given exit direction. This method is used in the world model to get the actual room to which an exit leads.
        Specified by:
        getExit in interface Room
        Parameters:
        direction - one of the button constants in UIConstants, ex UIConstants.NW_BUTTON
        Returns:
        the room that is found when exiting this room in the given direction, or null if no exit is possible in that direction.
        See Also:
        Room.getExitLabel(int)

      • getExitLabel

        public String getExitLabel(int direction)
        Description copied from interface: Room
        Return the text that should be shown on the UI button for a given direction.
        Specified by:
        getExitLabel in interface Room
        Parameters:
        direction - one of the button constants in UIConstants
        Returns:
        the text that should be shown on the respective UI button, or null if the button should be hidden
        See Also:
        Room.getExit(int)

      • exiting

        public boolean exiting(Room toRoom)
        Description copied from interface: Room
        Called as the player is exiting the room (but is still there).
        Specified by:
        exiting in interface Room
        Parameters:
        toRoom - the room the player is attempting to move to.
        Returns:
        true to block the player from exiting, false to allow the exit (note that the exit may fail for other reasons)
